mapper.insert: insert into deck_list (user_id, deck_name, last_modify_time, share) values (#{param.userId}, #{param.deckName}, #{param.lastModifyTime}, #{param.share})

insert into deck_detail (deck_id, code, count, type) values
(#{item.deckId}, #{item.code}, #{item.count}, #{item.type})
mapper.select: select deck_id deckId, user_id userId, deck_name deckName, last_modify_time lastModifyTime, share share from deck_list where deck_id = #{deckId} limit 1
select detail_id detailId, deck_id deckId, code code, count count, type type from deck_detail where deck_id = #{deckId}

select d_d.detail_id detailId, d_d.deck_id deckId, d_d.code code, d_d.count count, d_d.type type from deck_detail d_d inner join deck_list d_l on d_l.deck_id = d_d.deck_id where d_l.user_id = #{userId} and d_d.code = #{code} and d_d.count > #{count}
